ticket.title: Dashboard and QorKPI
ticket.original-body:
Discussed examples:
###Config### @@@ ruby # config/kpi.rb kpi "country_daily_view" do # name of KPI chart :line # type of chart, could be: bar, pie, map keys Language.all.map(&:id) # data(:sync => true) do |key| # :sync option indicates wether the KPI data needs to be sync by rake task # Fetch data from GA, MailChimp or Database end end @@@
###Usage###
@@@ ruby render_kpi_chart('country_daily_view'， :key => Language.current.id) render_kpi_chart('country_daily_view'， :key => Language.current.id, :type => :image) # can render as as image, this will be used in email @@@
###Others###
provides following rake tasks:
rake qor:kpi:migrate rake qor:kpi:sync
ticket.latest-body:
Discussed examples:
###Config### @@@ ruby # config/kpi.rb kpi "country_daily_view" do # name of KPI chart :line # type of chart, could be: bar, pie, map keys Language.all.map(&:id) # data(:sync => true) do |key| # :sync option indicates wether the KPI data needs to be sync by rake task # Fetch data from GA, MailChimp or Database end end @@@
###Usage###
@@@ ruby render_kpi_chart('country_daily_view'， :key => Language.current.id) render_kpi_chart('country_daily_view'， :key => Language.current.id, :type => :image) # can render as as image, this will be used in email @@@
###Others###
provides following rake tasks:
rake qor:kpi:migrate rake qor:kpi:sync
ticket.original-body-html:
Discussed examples:

Config

# config/kpi.rb
kpi "country_daily_view" do # name of KPI
  chart :line  # type of chart, could be: bar, pie, map 
  keys Language.all.map(&:id) # 
  data(:sync => true) do |key| # :sync option indicates wether the KPI data needs to be sync by rake task
    # Fetch data from GA, MailChimp or Database
  end
end

Usage

render_kpi_chart('country_daily_view'， :key => Language.current.id)
render_kpi_chart('country_daily_view'， :key => Language.current.id, :type => :image) # can render as as image, this will be used in email

Others

provides following rake tasks:

rake qor:kpi:migrate
rake qor:kpi:sync
